Package eu.h2020.helios_social.core.trustmanager

Class ContextTrustUpdater

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • eu.h2020.helios_social.core.trustmanager.ContextTrustUpdater
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable
    public class ContextTrustUpdater
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class implements the context-related threads, and contains the methods needed to compute the trust scores. Every time a context is created (or becomes active after a period of inactivity), the related thread is created (or becomes active). The manager communicates with the threads through variable conditions, that are exploited to put a thread in a wait state when the related context is not active anymore or, otherwise, to notify a thread that the related context has become active. For the period of time in which the context is active, each amount of time (which is specified by the parameter deltaT) the related thread computes a trust score for all the alters in that context.

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        Method that is executed when the Trust Manager calls the start method. It is the main flow (??) of the thread, that computes trust scores for each node in the related context in the latter's periods of activity.
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
        Overrides:
        run in class java.lang.Thread

      • updateTrust

        protected void updateTrust()
        Method that is invoked every deltaT seconds to update the trust scores towards all the nodes in the context. The trust scores are then saved on the Contextual Ego Network.

      • newAlterTrust

        protected void newAlterTrust​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node alter)
        This method is called whenever a new alter is added to the context this thread refers to. It computes and stores the initial trust value towards the alter.
        Parameters:
        alter - The alter that has been newly added to the context this thread refers to

      • initializeTrust

        protected float initializeTrust​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node alter)
        This method computes the initial trust score towards an alter in the context.
        Parameters:
        alter - The alter towards which the trust score is initialized
        Returns:
        A float value, that is the initial trust score

      • getTrust

        public float getTrust​(eu.h2020.helios_social.core.contextualegonetwork.Node alter)
        This method returns the latest computed trust score towards an alter in this specific context.
        Parameters:
        alter - The alter towards which the trust score is requested
        Returns:
        The last trust value that has been computed for an alter, or 0 if the alter doesn't exist in this context or if alter is null

        protected java.util.concurrent.locks.Lock getLock()
        Returns:

      • setActive

        protected void setActive()
        This method notifies this thread that the corresponding context's state has turned to active.

      • setInactive

        protected void setInactive()
        This method notifies this thread that the corresponding context's state has turned to inactive.

      • terminate

        protected void terminate()
        This method sets the termination variable to true because the context that corresponds to this thread has been removed from the Contextual Ego Network. This thread will stop its life flow.
